title: From Gold II to Silver III...

replies.body: Welcome to season 7, just riot trolling as usual.
So... youre saying that I deserve, somehow the Silver 3? I mean, Im at 10 wins and 2 losses. I think its a bit low? I mean, maybe im just being salty, dunno.
That sounds like a legitimate placement. Most placements will usually put you a league or lower (maybe a little higher) then your last seasons' ranked.

> [{quoted}](name=Plastic Mem0ries,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uoYLV4hW,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-11-16T02:29:05.125+0000)
>
> That sounds a legitimate placement. Most placements will usually put you a league or lower (maybe a little higher) then your last seasons' ranked.

Okie, thanks!
Also! A question, considering I already got felled in the replacement. If I were to go up back to Gold 2, would i get something closer to Gold 2 in Season 7?
